ComicInfo.Series: The Manhattan Projects: The Sun Beyond the Stars
ComicInfo.Summary:
“UNRELIABLE”
If you’re depending on a lying robot not to get you into trouble with an intergalactic criminal science organization called the Library, then always bet on Black. The greatest FEEL GOOD, BAD SCIENCE book in the long history of man returns in THE MANHATTAN PROJECTS: THE SUN BEYOND THE STARS.
ComicInfo.Title: The Sun Beyond the Stars
ComicInfo.Locations: Science Council Homeworld,Faraway Station,Sionnu Ternary System,Space
